call_title: Dev Update Sept. 15th 2024 |  Satergo, Paideia, Celaut, Sigs Mining, CU DAO, Rep System and more!

decisions.decision: Old Sigmanauts mining pool will be shut down tomorrow
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Only 10 miners remain on old pool with seven gigahash
decisions.quote: I'm going to shut it down tomorrow, guys. So if you are still on the old Sigmanauts pool, please update to Mark's new address

commitments.commitment: Installing storage rent onto Mark the Shark's new cheaper server today and will point all Sigmanauts mining hash to it
commitments.quote: Installing storage rent onto Mark the Shark's new cheaper server today and will point all Sigmanauts mining hash to it

commitments.commitment: Meet with student body next Thursday to explain how the DAO will function
commitments.quote: Next up, meet with student body next Thursday

commitments.commitment: Integrating mining swaps into mining core after understanding payment tables better
commitments.quote: before integrating the mining swaps. Should be simple and straightforward, but there's, of course, the unknown. So soon on that

commitments.commitment: Make announcement on Twitter and repost on main account about pool shutdown
commitments.quote: Maybe make an announcement like on the Sigmanauts or something like that

open_questions.question: Whether people will create scammy wallet optimization utilities as storage rent becomes more popular
open_questions.context: Discussion about potential low-hanging fruit scams related to storage rent cleanup

open_questions.question: Who runs ergodex.com clone site
open_questions.context: Unknown operator of forked Spectrum interface creates security concerns

open_questions.question: Pricing for relay services for anonymous shipping
open_questions.context: Discussion about anonymity options for physical goods purchases

key_facts.fact: Storage rent is 0.14 ERG on average per every four years, ranging from less than 0.14 to up to 0.9 ERG depending on data in the box
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Storage rent protocol changes require 90% super consensus and result in a hard fork
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool collected almost 30 ERGs from storage rent, found three blocks in 24 hours with about 30 gigahash
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Mark solo mined three blocks within a week on two gigahash
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: 30,000 ERG swap to Cardano got stuck due to insufficient Rosen ERG in Cardano hot wallet
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: New blockchain index into database completed in less than 24 hours
key_facts.speaker: qx() (reporting PGR456's work)

key_facts.fact: Sky Harbor smart contracts are 100% done, backend almost done with PostgreSQL database as last component
key_facts.speaker: qx() (reporting Kwaka's update)

key_facts.fact: Old Sigmanauts pool has 10 miners with seven gigahash
key_facts.speaker: qx()
